articles.author: Josh Alper
articles.title: Jerry Jeudy: My dropped passes are unacceptable - NBC Sports
articles.description: The Broncos looked wide receiver Jerry Jeudy‘s way often in Sunday’s 19-16 loss to the Chargers, but they didn’t get much out of those throws. Drew Lock targeted Jeudy 15 times in the game and Jeudy had six catches for 61 yards. The first-round pick also had …
